manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vehicle Fitment. Wheel Simulators is perfectly fit for 2003-2019 Dodge Ram 3500, select your vehicle's year make and model to make sure it fits. About us. BOOGADEE is a WHEEL SIMULATOR company with industry-leading solutions; Ensures compatibility and adaptability between components; Providing professional,deep and efficient adjustments. What can we do for you? We would like to provide high-quality products continuously. All of BOOGADEE WHEEL SIMUATIORS are made of high quality 304 stainless steel after 27 processes, then pure hand polished 5 times in our factory.

What can a BOOGADEE WHEEL SIMULATOR do for you? It will make your vehicles look pretty good and protect your hub,especially when you're driving on a road covered with melted salt,It can protect your wheels from corrosion. What do you need to do? It is very easy to install and had no issues aligning them or bolting them on.BOOGADEE WHEEL SIMULATIOR installation only takes 15 minutes to complete.We can provide you installation instruction guide. Durable and Long Lasting These wheel simulators are durable and secure, so you’ll never have to worry about replacing them，also they have the highest rating of resistance to both rust and corrosion so they will never rust or turn yellow.

Give any vehicle a unique, aggressive look at a fraction cost. All mounting hardware and instructions are included, fast and easy to install to install and remove for tire maintenance，based on bolt-on mounting style, perfectly fit for your vehicle Easy care and maintenance ,You will just be able to wash off with soap and water and they will keep their shine for years! reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy installation, good quality and fit , so far easy cleaning and very happy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First of all, those that complain about no instructions probably can’t tie their shoe laces. Install couldn’t be more self explanatory.Only downside I see besides the “tool” not being there(T handle screwdriver)and rubber washers to hold the lug nuts against the cap is that the 2 bolts that hold the outer cover on are kinda questionable. An Allen head or torx head would look better than a phillips that is supplied but the problem is there is no Loctite on the bolts. They thread in easy so I can see them coming out easy. To those that purchase these, put some blue Loctite on the bolts.The design is simple and works great. The shell that mounts on the rim is attached by 4 of the lug nuts that hold the rim, the outer hub portion holds to the shell with the 2 bolts I mentioned. Why the factory doesn’t make them like this is plain ignorance because they know the plastic ends break off the factory caps everytime a cap is pulled off.The price looked too good to be true. $300 for all 4 compared to $1000 for the stock ones that break every other time they get pulled off.I’m sold and will be purchasing these for the rest of my fleet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Would have been great to have included instructions
reviews.reviewText: Good product. They look great and fit really well. Had to go to another product's page to figure out install, but happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks good fits good
reviews.reviewText: I put them on a 2015 f350 , worked great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes my truck look new.
reviews.reviewText: My husband bought these because the local tire shop broke the stock ones on his truck. They are metal not plastic, and they make the truck look completely different. Not very hard to put on and don't have to worry about them breaking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They screw on and don’t fall off

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars There were no spacers included
reviews.reviewText: I had to figure out that there needs to be spacers between the simulator and the rim so that you can snug up the bolts that hold the simulator on or else it will bend the simulator and still not be tight … other than that they look great fit well but I will have to remove the rear ones to fill the tires or else get valve extenders of some sort … I also had to grind my 2 existing lug nuts down in order to get at least 4 threads for the sleeve to connect sufficiently
